00010 CPhysicsSettings::CPhysicsSettings() {
00011  // used for jumping
00012  player.maxjumpspeed = 120;
00013 
00014  player.maxpogospeed = 165;
00015  player.impossiblepogospeed = 175;
00016 
00017  player.defaultjumpupdecreasespeed = 4;
00018  player.jumpdecrease_x = 64;
00019 
00020  player.max_x_speed = 68;
00021  //player.max_x_speed = 75;
00022  player.pogostickonstart = false;
00023 
00024  // when falling keen's Y inertia increases up to maximum

00036 /**
00037  * \brief This function loads some constants, this normally happens when the game is loaded
00038  *     and the values change depending on what is read for the mods
00039  */
00040 void CPhysicsSettings::loadGameConstants(int episode, byte* data)
00041 {
00042  if(episode == 1)
00043  { // Code for Episode 1.
00044 
00045   // player
00046   byte pogo = *(data+0x900E);
00047   player.pogostickonstart = pogo;
00048   player.start_with_shots = *(data+0x9008);
00049 
00050   // vorticon
00051   vorticon.default_hp = *(data+0x180D)+1;
00052   vorticon.commander_hp = *(data+0x1819)+1;
00053 
00054   // tank bot
00055   tankbot.shot_height_from_top = *(data+0x4900);
00056   misc.ctspace_ammo = GETWORD(data+0xE03);
00057   misc.ctspace_keys = GETWORD(data+0xE11);
00058   misc.one_eyed_tile = GETWORD(data+0x4547);
00059 
00060   misc.joy_tile = GETWORD(data+0x992A);
00061   misc.bat_tile = GETWORD(data+0x995D);
00062   misc.vac_tile = GETWORD(data+0x9990);
00063   misc.wsk_tile = GETWORD(data+0x99C3);
00064 
00065   misc.raygun_tile = GETWORD(data+0x1166);
00066   misc.pogo_tile = GETWORD(data+0x11A7);
00067   misc.changestoneblock = GETWORD(data+0x2414);
00068   // TODO: ... More stuff will come here
00069  }
00070  else if(episode == 2)
00071  { // Code for Episode 2.
00072   player.pogostickonstart = true;
00073   player.start_with_shots = *(data+0x8AA2);
00074   // TODO: ... More stuff will come here
00075  }
00076  else if(episode == 3)
00077  { // Code for Episode 3.
00078   player.pogostickonstart = true;
00079   player.start_with_shots = 5;
00080   // TODO: ... More stuff will come here
00081  }
00082 }
